author: sergio.sp
title: ALMAGUA CO2
description: Global emissions reached a record 33,143 million tons of CO2 in 2018, in Colombia they reached 74,954 kilotonnes two years ago.
solution: Create a DAO on the Cardano mainnet with democratic voting power for the creation of certified carbon neutral credits such as NFTs.
experience:
ALMAGUA was created with the support of the Advanced Leadership Foundation.  
2020 patent for solar boats in colombia
2021 The Zayed
